meta.title: WiseLake – Nano Start, Mega Impact
meta.description: WiseLake builds micropayment infrastructure for the AI agent economy. NanoTrans enables instant global settlement of nano-scale transactions.

hero.subtitle1_line2: for a world where AI transacts autonomously
hero.subtitle2: 700+ farms · 20 years of data · #1 swine ERP market share

vision.visionTitle1: The Payment Rails of the AI Economy
vision.visionTitle2: The Global Standard for Value Exchange
vision.visionDesc: In a world where AI agents transact autonomously, even a fraction of a cent worth of data must reach anywhere on the globe in 0.1 seconds. WiseLake builds that pathway.
vision.missionDesc: An ecosystem where every piece of content and every data point is paid its fair value. NanoTrans, built on the x402 Protocol, is already taking that first step.

problem.label: Problem
problem.title: AI Agents Are Ready. Payment Infrastructure Is Not.
problem.subtitle2: Legacy payment systems cannot keep up.

minAmount.title: Minimum Transaction Too High
minAmount.desc: A $0.01 data query, a $0.001 news sentence — in legacy payment systems, fees exceed the principal. Nano-scale transactions between AI agents simply cannot happen.

latency.title: Slow Settlement
latency.desc: AI agents decide their next action in 0.01 seconds. Settlement that takes 1 second to several days is incompatible with the speed of the AI economy.

model.title: Heavy Billing Models
model.desc: Subscriptions charge for what you don't use. Ads sell user attention. Neither concept exists for AI agents.

problem.conclusion_line1: The AI economy has already begun.
problem.conclusion_line2: Only the payment infrastructure is still stuck in the past.

nanotrans.title: NanoTrans
nanotrans.subtitle: Just as HTTP became the standard for information transfer, the x402 Protocol becomes the standard for AI agent payments.

microPayment.title: Micro Transactions from $0.01
microPayment.desc: A $0.01 AI data query, a $0.001 news sentence — all tradeable. Recovering nano-scale value that legacy systems gave up on.

settlement.title: 0.1s Global Settlement
settlement.desc: An AI agent in Seoul pays instantly for a response from a Tokyo data center. In 0.1 seconds, anywhere in the world.

payPerContent.title: Pay-per-Content
payPerContent.desc: $0.05 for an article, $0.01 for a report page. No subscriptions, no ads — pay only for what you actually consume.

payPerUse.title: Pay-per-Use
payPerUse.desc: $0.005 per API call. 1,000 calls = $5. Pay exactly for what you use. The fundamental principle of AI agent transactions.

pigplan.title: #1 Market Share in Korean Swine ERP
pigplan.desc: PigPlan is the market-leading swine ERP solution used by Korea's top livestock cooperatives and enterprises including Dodram, Dabi Genetics, and Woosung Feed.
pigplan.psy: PSY (Pigs per Sow per Year) is the key metric determining farm profitability. Farms that consistently log data in PigPlan show meaningfully higher PSY compared to those that don't. Over 20 years of data proves it.
pigplan.clients: Key Clients: Dodram, Dabi Genetics, Woosung Feed

partners.label: Trusted by Industry Leaders
partners.mafra: Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs
partners.kape: Korea Institute for Animal Products Quality Evaluation

insightPigplan.label: Subscription Report
insightPigplan.title: Insight PigPlan
insightPigplan.desc: Gestation, weaning, farrowing, shipment — if any of these slip by just one week, PSY drops. Insight PigPlan sends a 'must-do tasks this week' checklist to the farmer's smartphone every Monday morning.
insightPigplan.benefit: One timely alert can make a difference of hundreds of thousands of won per sow.

pigSignal.title: Swine Data via Pay-per-Use API
pigSignal.desc: Combining 20 years of PigPlan data, ICT sensor data, and public livestock data into datasets delivered via REST API. Target customers: swine distributors, processors, feed companies, and livestock research institutions.
pigSignal.nanotransIntegration: PigPlan's 20-year data asset × NanoTrans Pay-per-Use. Taking Korean swine data to the global API market for the first time.

cre8Series1.title: cre8 AI Services
cre8Series1.subtitle: Built and operated directly by WiseLake. Both a proving ground for NanoTrans infrastructure and independent businesses.

cre8contents.desc: The first live proof-of-concept for NanoTrans. Applying micropayments to a K-Culture blog, proving the 'pay directly for content without subscriptions' model.

cre8block.desc: We sell permanence, not legal authority. Promises stored on BNB Chain cannot be deleted.

cre8pet.desc: A global service that records GPS-based dog walks and preserves memories with your pet.

cre8song.desc: AI writes the lyrics and composes the music. Professional producers finish it. A one-of-a-kind song and music video — the most special gift.

b2bSaas.title: B2B SaaS Solutions
b2bSaas.sectionDesc: Born from a team of 10 that moves at the speed of 100. B2B productivity tools from real operational experience.

flow9.desc: 'How much cash can we actually spend today?' — Get your available-cash report on your smartphone every morning. No accounting software login needed. No CFO required.

qbridge.name: Q-Bridge
qbridge.desc: The #1 reason loyal customers leave: slow response times. Q-Bridge unifies your customer channels and helps small businesses achieve better response rates within 24 hours.

2028: NanoTrans: adopted as AI agent payment standard protocol

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Let's Build Together
contact.subtitle: Partnerships, investment inquiries, and service adoption — all welcome. Our team responds within 24 business hours.

form.name: Name
form.errorGeneric: Failed to send. Please try again.

success.title: Message Sent
success.desc: A member of our team will reach out within 1 business day.

ecosystemArch.label: Ecosystem Architecture
ecosystemArch.title: Every Service Converges on NanoTrans
ecosystemArch.desc: While PigPlan earns trust across 700+ farms and cre8 series builds a real user base — data and content assets accumulate. On top of that foundation, NanoTrans completes itself as the payment infrastructure of the AI economy.
ecosystemArch.imageAlt: WiseLake business ecosystem architecture diagram: Layer 1 Interaction (Human · AI Agent) → Layer 2 Application (cre8 series · PigPlan · B2B SaaS) → Layer 3 Asset (Content & Data Assets) → Layer 4 Infrastructure (NanoTrans)
ecosystemArch.mobileNote: Rotate to landscape for the best view of this diagram.

layer1.label: Layer 1 · Interaction
layer1.title: User Touch Points
layer1.desc: Dog walks, contract records, custom songs — it starts with services real people use every day.

layer2.label: Layer 2 · Application
layer2.title: A Diverse Service Portfolio
layer2.desc: PigPlan, cre8pet, cre8song, cre8contents, cre8block. Each operates independently and is validated in real markets.

layer3.label: Layer 3 · Asset
layer3.title: Data and Content Assets Accumulate
layer3.desc: 20 years of swine data, K-Culture content, dog walk records. The longer we operate, the deeper the asset base grows.

layer4.label: Layer 4 · Infrastructure
layer4.title: NanoTrans Infrastructure Is Realized
layer4.desc: When accumulated assets are traded via API and content is charged per unit — NanoTrans becomes the standard that governs that flow.

serviceOverview.label: Services
serviceOverview.title: What We Build
serviceOverview.subtitle: Each service operates independently, connected as one ecosystem centered on NanoTrans.

nanotrans.title: NanoTrans
nanotrans.summary: Payment infrastructure for the AI agent economy. x402 Protocol, $0.01 to global settlement in 0.1s. The payment engine behind all WiseLake services.

pigplan.title: PigPlan
pigplan.summary: 20 years of data, 700+ farms, #1 market share. Korea's top vertical SaaS evolving into a global data API.

services.title: cre8 Series
services.summary: NanoTrans proving ground and independent businesses. AI content, blockchain promises, pet walks, AI songwriting.

b2b.title: B2B SaaS
b2b.summary: Available-cash reports (Flow9) and customer management (Q-Bridge). Tools for a team of 10 to move at the speed of 100.
